name: Somali Library
description: Somali Library app is the largest Somali books directory. Somali Curriculum books in digital format can be found here, as well as books in Somali language and other languages about Somalia.  All the books can be read in the app, downloaded, and used without internet for later usage.  Currently, Somali Library is adding books on daily bases, if you think we havent added or missed a book, you can let us know and we will review it to be added as soon as possible.  App-kan waxaa ku jira dhammaan buugaagtii manhajka Soomalaiyeed, waxaa kaloo laga heli karaa buugaag kasto oo Afka Soomaaliga ku qoran ama Soomaalida laga qorey oo lagu qorey afaf kale, maalin walba waxaan ku darnaa buugaag cusub marka ha moogaanin.  In the app, you can:  - Select categories, and find many books in a specific category, click the book, and click again the header to read, or select from the menu on top to read it.  - You can share the app or books with your friends families  - You can download books into the app for later reading without internet.  - You can add books into favorites for easy access  - You can register for easy browsing, you can also skip registration  - You can view latest books that has been added    Search us on: Duruus, Somali Library, Tafsiirka, Somali books, and Somali TV
